title: The Binding Of  Isaac:Rebirth PC
description:
Inforamtion

Release Date: November 4, 2014
Genre : Action / RPG / Top-down
Developer : NICALiS
Publisher : NICALiS
Platform: PC
Steam ID: 250900
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English
Language: English
Tablet: Present [SKIDROW]

System Requirements

Operating System : Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / 8.1 (both 32 / 64bit versions)
Processor : 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
RAM : 4 GB RAM
Free space on HDD: 500 MB
Graphics card : Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher

About This Game

The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth - a remake of the game The Binding of Isaac, scheduled for November 4, 2014 . The remake will be developed by Nicalis led by Edmund MakMillenom . "Rebirth" is not on the Flash platform. Also will include content from the supplement Wrath of the Lamb, and not included in it because of the restrictions Flash- engine.

Installation

Set # 1 (Normal ) :
1. Copy the contents of the release to any location on your hard drive.
2. Copy the contents of the folder NoDVD in a folder with the game.
3. Play
Set # 2 ( For holders of a license ) :
Attention! Before installing a client Steam, the game should already be registered on your account , and the client Steam - closed!
1. Copy the contents of the release into the folder with your Steam-client (..  Steam  SteamApps  common  The Binding of Isaac Rebirth)
2. Copy the contents of the folder in the Steam folder with your client
3. Play
